name: ESRI GridFloat Output File
description: A simple interchange format, originating used primarily for exchange of a single layer of gridded or raster data between software programs.  The contents represent a single measure for each cell in a rectangular grid.  The many file consists of numbers in binary form.  An auxiliary header file specifies the grid dimensions and, optionally, coordinates to relate the grid to other georeferenced data.
